snippet.title: Dandy Dungeon ~Legend of Brave Yamada~ Trailer (Mobile, 2017)
snippet.description:
Try DANDY DUNGEON for FREE on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/dandy-dungeon-legend-of-brave-yamada-switch/

Try DANDY DUNGEON for FREE on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1138970/Dandy_Dungeon__Legend_of_Brave_Yamada/

Yamada-kun (Age 36) is a programmer at a major game publisher. He hates his job. Alone in his apartment, deep into the night, he toils to create a game of his own: it's an RPG, and he is the hero, Brave Yamada!

One day, he falls in love at first sight with his new neighbor Maria-chan. In an effort to nurture these feelings, he adds Princess Maria into his game!

Will Yamada-kun and Maria-chan find love?

Is destiny pre-programmed, or randomly generated? Is love a bug or a feature?

Find out in this unique RPG on Nintendo Switch and Steam, from Tokyo indie developer Onion Games!

Click here to find out more about DANDY DUNGEON: http://dandydungeon.com/
Click here to find out more about Onion Games: http://oniongames.jp/
